title: Upside Down
lyrics:
[intro] | (C) | (Dm) | x2
 
(C)Who's to say…  
What's impossible, well (Dm)they forgot
This world keeps spinning and with (C)each new day
I can feel a change in (Dm)everything
And as the surface breaks re(C)flections fade
But in some ways they re(Dm)main the same
And as my mind begins to (C)spread its wings
There's no stopping curi(Dm)osity (Dm-stop)
 
[chorus]                                    
I want to turn the whole thing (C)upside (Dm)down
(F) I will find the (G)things they say just (C)can't be (Dm) found
(F) I'll share this (G)love I find with (C)every(Dm)one
(F) We'll sing and (G)dance to Mother (C)Nature's (Dm) songs
(F) I don't want this (G)feeling to go away
[interlude] | (C) | (Dm) | x2
 
(C)Who's to say…
I can't do everything, well (Dm)I can try
And as I roll along I be(C)gin to find
Things aren't always just (Dm)what they seem (Dm-stop)
 
[chorus]                                    
I want to turn the whole thing (C)upside (Dm)down
(F) I will find the (G)things they say just (C)can't be (Dm) found
(F) I'll share this (G)love I find with (C)every(Dm)one
(F) We'll sing and (G)dance to Mother (C)Nature's (Dm) songs
(F) This world keeps (G)spinning and there's (Em)no… time to (Dm)waste
Well it (Em)all… keeps (Dm)spinning spinning (G)round and round and
(C)Upside (Dm)down
(F) Who's to say what's im(G)possible and (C)can't be (Dm) found
(F) I don't want this (G)feeling to go away
[outro] | (C) | (Dm) Please don't go away
| (C) | (Dm) Is this how it's supposed to be
(C) [end]
